salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Registered MLT) to LKR 300,000+ (Laboratory Manager) per month.
futureOutlook: MLTs are the backbone of medical diagnostics. The expansion of private hospital chains and diagnostic laboratories across the country ensures a steady demand for qualified professionals. Specialization in areas like molecular diagnostics or microbiology can lead to better career opportunities. It is a stable and respected profession in the healthcare sector.
